title: The 100 best rugby players in the world part five: 20-1
text:
After revealing the top 80 players, we are down to our top 20 and the final countdown towards who we believe is the best player in the world.

What makes the top players in the game stand out above the rest? Their ability to win matches for their team, sometimes all on their own.

With that in mind, we asked all of our rugby writers to vote for their top 50 players in the world and combined their picks with those of coaches and directors of rugby from within the English game.

We also asked Telegraph subscribers to nominate their top 10 best current players, and their votes have been included within our calculations. The result is this, our list of the 100 best players in the world today. Here are...
description: After revealing the top 80 players, we are down to our top 20 and the final countdown towards who we believe is the best player in the world.
